meanings.definition: To shout or call out loudly
meanings.sent1: She was hilloaing for her lost dog in the park.
meanings.sent2: The coach was hilloaing instructions to the players during the game.
meanings.sent3: The parrot started hilloaing back at the noisy children.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm seemed to be hilloaing warnings in the distance.
meanings.sent5: His hilloaing voice echoed through the empty streets.

meanings.definition: The act of shouting or calling out loudly
meanings.sent1: The hilloaing from the crowd could be heard from miles away.
meanings.sent2: After the hilloaing, silence fell over the forest.
meanings.sent3: The hilloaing of the auctioneer added excitement to the event.
meanings.sent4: The hilloaing of the sirens signaled the start of the race.
meanings.sent5: The hilloaing of the fans filled the stadium with energy.
